author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Aphria Selects Great North Distributors For Canada-Wide Distribution Of Adult-Use Cannabis
text:
May 17 (Reuters) - Aphria Inc:
* APHRIA SELECTS GREAT NORTH DISTRIBUTORS, A CANADIAN SUBSIDIARY OF SOUTHERN GLAZER’S WINE & SPIRITS, FOR CANADA-WIDE DISTRIBUTION OF ADULT-USE CANNABIS
* APHRIA INC - UNDER TERMS OF AGREEMENT, GREAT NORTH DISTRIBUTORS WILL BE APHRIA’S EXCLUSIVE CANNABIS REPRESENTATIVE IN CANADA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
